name: Da Vinci's Formula
description:
Get through Leonardo's last, mysterious research and craft the Elixir!

In this short, relaxing, puzzle game, you will be playing as Francesco Melzi, Da Vinci's assistant.

Pick up items, use them to create combinations and find out how to create the miraculous Elixir!

This game was created in one month in a Game Jam themed "Leonardo da Vinci".
